short.ar: استخدام الهاتف أو الكمبيوتر اللوحي لمسح رمز الاستجابة السريعة ولدت واتخاذ الموقع معك
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Use a phone or tablet to scan the generated QR code and take the website with you!
short.de: Verwenden Sie ein Smartphone oder Tablet, um den generierten QR-Code zu scannen und die Website mitzunehmen!
short.fr: Utilisez un téléphone ou une tablette pour scanner le code QR généré et prendre le site avec vous!
short.it: Usa un telefono o un tablet per scansionare il codice QR generato e portare il sito web con te!
short.zh_CN: 使用手机或平板电脑扫描生成的QR码，网站随身携带!
short.zh_TW: 使用手機或平板電腦掃描生成的QR碼，網站隨身攜帶!

long.ar,de,fr,it,zh_CN,zh_TW:
Half way through reading an article on a laptop and need to leave? No problem, take your phone or tablet out, scan the QR code generated by the app and keep reading :)

Features
- Trigger the App with a shortcut: Ctrl+Shift+F (Windows / Mac)
- Adjust the size of your QR code with one click
- Works with any website
- Simple to use, scan and go
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Half way through reading an article on a laptop and need to leave? No problem, take your phone or tablet out, scan the QR code generated by the app and keep reading :)

Features
- Use your camera app on the iPhone to scan the QR code directly!
- Adjust the size of your QR code with one click
- Works with any website
- Simple to use, scan and go
